rooms.description: An open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen and home theater; Scandinavian minimalistic design with natural light.
Open-plan kitchen connected to the living area; efficient Scandinavian design with sustainable materials.
Master bedroom featuring a king-size bed and built-in storage; designed with Scandinavian aesthetics.
Guest bedroom with comfortable space and natural light; incorporates Scandinavian style.
A dedicated home theater space integrated within the open-plan living area; includes soundproofing and ambient lighting.
Additional storage for home theater equipment and other utilities; designed with Scandinavian simplicity.
